testcase.name: Explorer can login via credentials and reach dashboard
Explorer can create a new account and see onboarding welcome

failure.message:
TimeoutError: locator.waitFor: Timeout 30000ms exceeded. Call log: - waiting for locator('xpath=(//*[contains(normalize-space(), "Welcome to Kamleen")])[1]') to be visible
Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout or double check your locator as the targeted element(s) couldn't be found.

testcase.name: Home page loads and shows search

failure.message:
Setup failed: TimeoutError: page.goto: Timeout 30000ms exceeded. Call log: - navigating to "http://host.docker.internal:3000/", waiting until "load"
Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout.
Also teardown failed: Error: Tried to take screenshot, but no page was open.

testcase.name: Experiences page loads and shows heading
